original_title: 1888: El Extraordinario Viaje de la Santa Isabel
overview: "1888: The Extraordinary Voyage of The Santa Isabel" is a whimsical adventure fantasy about a tired Jules Verne, fleeing from Paris and a bored wife, who joins Italian explorer Stradelli in an expedition on the Orinoco river. Along the way they pickup a young stranger- a woman disguised as a man, searching for her lost father.
title: 1888: The Extraordinary Voyage of the Santa Isabel
